title: 177 Write a New Story
description:
"What we think and feel shows up in the mirror, on the street corner, and on the other side of the world." - Lewis Howes
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, the bonus clip, and more at lewishowes.com/177.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
